library.name: SevenSegDisplays
library.description: 7 segment 4 digits LED display easy to use and powerful library for modules based on 74HC595 (or similar) shift registers chips. Developed for the cheap and popular '4-bit Led Digital Tube Module' (**_and for all the custom made displays as: GIANTS COUNTERS, TIMERS, PRICING DISPLAYS, etc._**)  based on two 74HC595 (or similar) shift registers, the main focus was set on: ease of use, flexibility and basic prevention of 'misrepresentation' errors.
library.keywords: 7 Segment, 4 digits, 74HC595, LED, display, print, blink, gauge, floating point, negative, shift register, counter, tally counter, click counter
